message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product and believe it would be valuable to you. I'm offering it to you for $140. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I think $140 is a bit high. I'm willing to pay $110 for it.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective on the price.  I could come down to $130. I believe this product will be very beneficial for you, even at this price.
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'd be willing to pay $115 for the product.
Bob, I appreciate you working with me on the price.  How about we split the difference and settle at $122.50?  This is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'd be willing to pay $112 for the product.
